title: Symplicity Spyral™ renal denervation system
shortdesc: The Symplicity Spyral™ renal denervation (RDN) system is used during the Symplicity™ blood pressure procedure for the treatment of hypertension.
deschead: Introducing a procedure to treat hypertension
description: During the Symplicity™ blood pressure procedure, an interventionalist uses the Symplicity Spyral™ RDN system to supply precisely controlled and targeted radiofrequency (RF) energy to the renal nerves, safely disrupting the overactive sympathetic signaling between the kidneys and brain to help reduce blood pressure.

ftr-1.name: Symplicity Spyral™ multi-electrode renal denervation catheter
ftrvals: One catheter size fits vessels 3-8 mm
4 F catheter, compatible with 6 F guide catheter, 0.014 inch guidewire
Easy-to-use, plug-and-play design
Nonocclusive design allows for continuous blood flow to naturally protect the vessel wall

ftr-2.name: Symplicity G3™ renal denervation RF generator
ftrvals: Unique, real-time, and responsive algorithm automatically adjusts power by monitoring temperature and impedance for safe energy distribution
Multi-electrode, helical design covers four quadrants simultaneously for a circumferential ablation
Radiofrequency energy preferentially heats fat tissue where renal nerves are located and avoids nontarget structures

Only the Symplicity Spyral™ RDN system allows for denervation throughout the renal anatomy with a single catheter, including the distal branches, where late arriving nerves are accessible and total nerve density is highest

ftr-3.name: Proven to deliver significant, safe, and sustained blood pressure reductions
ftrvals: Multiple randomized, sham-controlled clinical trials
Real-world experience with more than 4,000 patients enrolled in the SPYRAL HTN clinical program

title: Accurian™ RF ablation platform
shortdesc: Accurian™ is a radiofrequency (RF) nerve tissue ablation platform that delivers consistent and predictable lesions and smart features for ease of use.
deschead: RF ablation platform designed from the ground up
description: The Accurian™ radiofrequency (RF) ablation platform combines proprietary hardware design and quad core processing, resulting in sophisticated algorithms that manage power and control temperature during ablation surgery. Together, enhanced and standard ablation procedures create a comprehensive range of lesion shapes, sizes, and volumes — predictably and consistently. Extensively tested for lasting reliability, the Accurian™ ablation therapy platform is upgrade-ready for the future.

ftr-1.name: Form consistent and predictable lesions across all channels
ftrvals: The ultra-responsive proprietary algorithm accurately regulates temperature — resulting in consistent and predictable lesion formation during the entire procedure on all active channels.
The SmartStart™ algorithm strategically distributes power to ensure that all channels reach and maintain the set temperature — reducing the risk of underpowered scenarios.

ftr-2.name: Smart probes
ftrvals: On-screen identification helps you easily troubleshoot a specific channel
Chip-enhanced probes
On-screen tutorials

ftr-3.name: Manage four channels independently
ftrvals: Channel-specific start/stop/restart, temperature control and timer control mean you can manage four ablations independently — even mid-procedure.
Advanced power management allows four channels to start simultaneously — independently or staggered.

ftr-4.name: Boost efficiency with smart features
ftrvals: PDF procedure and reusable probe usage reports
14-ft combined hub and probe cables
Ability to self-test and self-calibrate with each generator start, reducing the need for maintenance

ftr-5.name: Technology features
ftrvals: Easily upgrade software via USB to minimize downtime
High-resolution 16:9 touchscreen
HDMI port for secondary monitor
Intuitive and easy-to-use design
Room for up to 10 treatment or physician profiles

ftr-6.name: Accurian™ enhanced RF
ftrvals: Internally cooled probes create larger, spherical lesions (compared to standard lesions) with greater distal projection.
Enhanced probes offer increased flexibility in approach angle (as much as 45% of lesion volume is projected distally to probe tip).
Add cooling pump for enhanced procedures with internally cooled probes.

title: OsteoCool™ RF ablation system
shortdesc: OsteoCool™ cooled radiofrequency (RF) ablation system that uses simultaneous, dual-probe capabilities and algorithms to treat painful bone tumors.
deschead: Treat painful bone tumors confidently and consistently
description: The OsteoCool™ RF ablation system is cooled radiofrequency (RF) ablation technology that offers simultaneous, dual-probe capabilities for treating painful bone tumors. Coaxial, bipolar technology delivers RF energy to the site and automatically moderates power to keep RF heating within the desired treatment range. This reduces risk of potential thermal damage to adjacent tissue. The active tip of the ablation probe is internally cooled with circulating water. RF energy heats the tissue while circulating water moderates the temperature close to the active tip.

ftr-1.name: Customize your ablation options
ftrvals: Metastatic and benign bone tumor ablation
Simultaneous ablation of adjacent or multiple levels in the spine
Simultaneous ablation using two probes, such as bipedicular spine tumor ablation
Ablation using one probe
Multiple active tip sizes and introducer gauge options
Custom ablation zones
Track ablation

title: PulseSelect™ pulsed field ablation system
shortdesc: The PulseSelect™ pulsed field ablation (PFA) system enables both mapping and precise lesion delivery using biphasic waveform optimization.
deschead: Setting a new standard in safety. Engineered for efficiency.
description: The PulseSelect™ PFA system is setting a new standard in safety for paroxysmal and persistent atrial fibrillation ablation, supported by 15 years of robust preclinical and clinical evidence. The PulseSelect™ PFA system offers a differentiated approach to pulsed field ablation that can be implemented across workflows, driving safe, effective, and efficient procedures.

ftr-1.name: Unmatched safety
ftrvals: Engineered with differentiated safety features from 15 years of PFA research and backed by one of the safest investigational device exemption (IDE) AF ablation trials to date.

ftr-2.name: Consistent efficiency
ftrvals: Rapid, effective pulmonary vein isolation (PVI) through consistent and predictable energy delivery and catheter maneuverability

ftr-3.name: Simplified adaptability
ftrvals: Seamless transition to PFA with freedom to adapt to your preferred workflow

ftr-4.name: PulseSelect™ generator
ftrvals: Automatic overcurrent detection for safe energy delivery
R-wave gating for synchronization of energy delivery
Test pulse for proximity detection to phrenic nerve

ftr-5.name: PulseSelect™ PFA catheter features
ftrvals: 9 electrodes built to sense, ablate, and pace
25 mm diameter loop
9 Fr shaft with bidirectional steering

title: Sphere-9™ PF Ablation catheter
shortdesc: The Sphere-9™ mapping and ablation catheter provides mapping and dual-energy ablation options including radiofrequency (RF) and pulsed field (PF) energies.
description: The Sphere-9™ mapping and ablation catheter provides unparalleled versatility, absolute control, and an optimized workflow for electrophysiologists.

ftr-1.name: All-in-one: map | ablate | validate
ftrvals: The novel Sphere-9™ catheter is an all-in-one tool enabling physicians to map, ablate, and validate with a single transeptal, zero-exchange workflow.
The compressible lattice tip with wide-area focal design and close unipolar mapping capability offers proven safety, efficacy, and superior efficiency1 to promote confidence in procedural outcomes.

ftr-2.name: Sphere-9™ catheter at a glance
ftrvals: 9 mm, compressible lattice ablation electrode
9 mini electrodes with integrated thermocouples
Central reference electrode
Low flow, central irrigation
8 Fr, bi-directional shaft

ftr-3.name: Map
ftrvals: Create high-density maps in less than 11 minutes with greater than 5000 points.
Close-unipolar mapping provides the benefits of bipolar and unipolar electrograms while avoiding the challenges of each
Maintain wavefront morphology
Reduce far-field potentials
Provide high fidelity and discreate EGMs

ftr-4.name: Wide-area focal lattice ablation electrode
ftrvals: 10 times larger effective surface area
Compressible tip for conformability and stability
THERMOCOOL SMARTTOUCH™ SF

ftr-5.name: RF and PF ablation options
ftrvals: 4-5 seconds energy application time
PF lesions greater than 17 mm wide
RF lesions greater than19 mm wide

title: OsteoCool™ 2.0 bone tumor ablation system
shortdesc: The OsteoCool™ 2.0 system is an internally-cooled radiofrequency (RF) ablation system with four-probe capability to palliatively treat painful bone tumors.
deschead: Efficiency of OsteoCool™ 2.0 RF ablation system
description: The OsteoCool™ 2.0 RF ablation system helps you deliver optimal care for your patients — faster. OsteoCool™ 2.0 ablates up to 30% faster than OsteoCool™ 1.0, supports the use of four probes simultaneously, and delivers a market-leading 20 W of power per channel.

ftr-1.name: Independent channel control
ftrvals: Independent channel control allows you to start and stop ablation on each channel individually, while internally-cooled probes reduce the risk of charring without introducing ionic solutions into the ablation.

ftr-2.name: Widest selection of probe sizes
ftrvals: OsteoCool™ 2.0 provides consistent, predictable ablation zones with the flexibility to tailor the ablation zone to your patients‘ needs. Backed by OPuS One,‡,5 the largest study of RF ablation in bone metastases, the OsteoCool™ 2.0 RF ablation system gives you the control to deliver powerful, predictable, and proven pain relief.

ftr-3.name: OsteoCool™ hard bone access kit
ftrvals: The Medtronic bone access tool kit includes a tapered cannula, sharper trocar, and enhanced drill design
Offer faster access to sclerotic bone
Reduce the force required to advance the tool
Are versatile for use for all cases

title: Barrx™ radiofrequency ablation system
shortdesc: The Barrx™ radiofrequency ablation system is used to treat Barrett's esophagus (BE) patients by eradicating Barrett's epithelium.
deschead: Why choose radiofrequency ablation for Barrett's esophagus patients?
description: The Barrx™ radiofrequency ablation system is designed to precisely eradicate the Barrett's epithelium. Barrett's esophagus patients with low-grade dyplasia treated with RFA have a substantial reduction in progression compared to patients who undergo surveillance alone. The Barrx™ radiofrequency ablation system includes the Barrx™ flex RFA energy generator and a family of ablation catheters.

ftr-1.name: When treating Barrett's esophagus
ftrvals: Dysplasia
Family history of Barrett's esophagus or EAC
Long-segment disease
Smoking tobacco

title: DiamondTemp™ RF generator
shortdesc: The DiamondTemp™ generator, pump, and accessories supply energy and temperature control to the DiamondTemp™ cathether during cardiac ablation procedures.
description: As the only open-irrigated radiofrequency (RF) catheter with industrial diamonds to optimize power based on tissue surface temperature, the DiamondTemp™ ablation system with RealTemp™ is safe and effective, and has demonstrated procedural efficiencies compared to contact force-sensing RF.

ftr-1.name: DiamondTemp™ generator connection box E
ftrvals: The Medtronic DiamondTemp™ generator connection box E is a signal filtration device used to connect the DiamondTemp™ ablation catheter and DiamondTemp™ RF generator to Abbott EnSite™* cardiac mapping and navigation systems configured to use NavX navigation technology

ftr-2.name: DiamondTemp™ RF generator
ftrvals: The DiamondTemp™ ablation generator operates in temperature control mode. The desired catheter tip-to-tissue temperature is selected by the user.

ftr-3.name: DiamondTemp™ catheter-to-RFG cable
ftrvals: The DiamondTemp™ catheter-to-RF generator cable provides the connection between the DiamondTemp™ generator and DiamondTemp™ catheter.

title: Barrx™ channel RFA endoscopic catheter
shortdesc: The Barrx™ channel RFA endoscopic catheter delivers radiofrequency ablation through the working channel of a flexible endoscope.
deschead: A breakthrough in RFA delivery therapy
description: The Barrx™ channel RFA endoscopic catheter delivers radiofrequency ablation through the working channel of a flexible endoscope, offering a simplified and more time-efficient procedure.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: Eliminates the need for multiple endoscope introductions
Semi-transparent ablation electrode offers enhanced visualization capabilities
Unique shaft design provides control and maneuverability
Offers expanded access within the GI tract

title: Barrx™ 60 RFA focal catheter (short segments)
shortdesc: The Barrx™ 60 RFA focal catheter is used for primary treatment of short to intermediate segments of Barrett's esophagus or for treatment after ablation.
description: The Barrx™ 60 RFA focal catheter enables physicians to provide primary treatment for short and intermediate length segments of non-circumferential Barrett's esophagus. Physicians can also provide secondary treatment after ablation.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: Provides easy introduction into upper GI tract
Allows positioning within the esophagus and gastroesophageal junction
Provides for direct visualization of electrode during procedure
Uses standard endoscopic technique
Articulated electrode platform moves in 2-D, left to right and front to back, to ensure tissue contact

ftr-2.name: General characteristics
ftrvals: Single-patient use
Up to 80 ablation treatments per session
Fits on distal end of a flexible endoscope

title: Valleylab™ adapter (Foot Switching)
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ active and specialty adapter interfaces with all electrosurgical generators for foot switching adaptation.
description: The Valleylab™ active and specialty adapter interfaces with all electrosurgical generators for foot switching adaptation.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: Fits with all electrosurgical generators for foot switching adaptation

title: Valleylab™ FT10 energy platform
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ FT10 energy platform drives our full portfolio of energy-based devices for use in a wide range of procedures.
description: For over 55 years, the Valleylab™ portfolio has shown an unwavering commitment to positive patient outcomes through trusted energy delivery, establishing pathways for future innovation in the surgical energy space.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ FT10 energy platform has optimized vessel sealing performance with LigaSure™ devices. High-speed, closed loop control continuously monitors the electrical properties of the tissue and uses an advanced vessel sealing algorithm to apply a proportionate amount of energy based on composition and size of the vessels being sealed.

title: Valleylab™ accessory holster
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ accessory holster stores pencils safely and conveniently between uses, reducing the potential for injury caused by inadvertent activation.
description: The Valleylab™ accessory holster stores pencils safely and conveniently between uses, reducing the potential for injury caused by inadvertent activation.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ accessory holster stores pencils safely and conveniently between uses, reducing the potential for injury

title: Valleylab™ FX8 energy platform
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ FX8 energy platform drives electrosurgical handpieces in surgical procedures that require division, hemostasis, and dissection.
description: The Valleylab™ FX8 energy platform is powered by our intelligent TissueFect™ tissue-sensing technology. It reads tissue composition to monitor and adjust to impedance as you perform. It is an electrosurgical device that adapts to produce consistent clinical tissue effects — in real time.

ftr-1.name: The Valleylab™ FX8 energy platform drives electrosurgical handpieces with precision using lower levels of energy
ftrvals: It's designed to support a wide range of surgical procedures that require division, hemostasis, and dissection.
The cut, coag, and soft coag modes, desiccate the tissue at a relatively slower rate with deeper thermal penetration.

ftr-2.name: The Valleylab™ FX8 energy platform enables two unique modes that can bring new possibilities to your procedures
ftrvals: Valleylab™ mode provides a unique combination of monopolar hemostasis and division.
Shared coag mode allows two surgeons to work on the same patient at the same time — from a single energy platform.

ftr-3.name: Plus, the Valleylab™ FX8 energy platform delivers
ftrvals: Precise monopolar and bipolar energy
Power control during monopolar energy delivery that's five times better than the ForceTriad™ energy platform
Tissue monitoring that's 2,600 times faster than the Force FX™ electrosurgical generator
Appropriate thermal spread

ftr-4.name: Intelligent — inside and out
ftrvals: A smart, simple, and intuitive interface
Simple controls and information displays
The flexibility of the Valleylab™ Exchange software update system, which allows you to upgrade to new features using the internet

title: Valleylab™ universal mounting cart
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ universal mounting cart helps surgical teams manage OR space more efficiently by storing up to two generators and a smoke evacuator.
deschead: Helps surgical teams manage more efficiently
description: The Valleylab™ universal mounting cart helps surgical teams manage OR space more efficiently by storing up to two generators and a smoke evacuator.

ftr-1.name: Two generators and a smoke evacuator
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ universal mounting cart helps surgical teams manage OR space more efficiently by storing up to two generators and a smoke evacuator.

title: Edge™ coated electrode
shortdesc: The Edge™ coated electrode is designed to deliver uncompromised cutting performance for fine dissection, no matter what type of tissue.
description: The Edge™ coated electrode has been proven to provide performance beyond all other coated blade electrodes on the market.

ftr-1.name: Edge coated blade electrodes
ftrvals: The Edge™ coated electrode has been proven to provide performance beyond all other coated blade electrodes on the market.

title: HET™ bipolar system
shortdesc: The HET™ bipolar system uses energy to treat grades I and II hemorrhoids in a non-surgical procedure.
deschead: HET™ bipolar system for the treatment of grades I and II internal hemorrhoids
description: The HET™ bipolar system is a gentle, simple, and efficient2 non-surgical treatment method for symptomatic grades I and II internal hemorrhoids. Its design allows treatment of all grade I and grade II internal hemorrhoids in one procedure. The treatment targets the area above the dentate line and its low treatment temperature minimizes collateral tissue damage.

ftr-1.name: How is the HET™ bipolar system different than other hemorrhoid treatment options?
ftrvals: Many hemorrhoid treatments, including banding and infrared coagulation, often require multiple procedures. In contrast, HET™ bipolar system allows for hemorrhoid treatment in a single therapy session.

title: Valleylab™ PolyHesive™ patient return electrode
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ PolyHesive™ corded patient return electrode is recognized worldwide for quality, safety, and innovative technology.
deschead: The Valleylab™ PolyHesive™ corded patient return electrode is manufactured with our patented PolyHesive™ II high moisture, conductive adhesive
description: The Valleylab™ PolyHesive™ corded patient return electrode is manufactured with our patented PolyHesive™ II high moisture, conductive adhesive hydrogel that provides the performance of a gel without the gel mess.

ftr-1.name: PolyHesive™ II hydrogel benefits
ftrvals: Water-based hydrogel lowers skin resistance
Elongation fills patient skin irregularities and minimizes contact voids to improve the total electrical conduction area

ftr-2.name: Electrode benefits
ftrvals: Surface area disperses current over large area, minimizing heat buildup
Acrylic adhesive improves pad contact quality and provides a moisture barrier to significantly reduce the potential for fluid invasion
Adult, infant (less than 30 lbs.), and neonatal (less than 6 lbs.) sizes available
Non-irritating and non-sensitizing

ftr-3.name: REM contact quality monitoring system
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ REM PolyHesive™ system monitors patient impedance levels, automatically deactivating the generator if a fault at the patient return electrode is detected.

title: Valleylab™ tip cleaner
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ tip cleaner is designed for use with stainless steel electrodes.
description: The Valleylab™ tip cleaner is designed for use with stainless steel electrodes.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ tip cleaner is designed for use with stainless steel electrodes.

title: Valleylab™ cord
shortdesc: Valleylab™ monopolar and bipolar accessory cords are available in single-use or reusable styles for hand switch or foot switch activated instruments.
description: Valleylab™ monopolar and bipolar accessory cords are available in single-use or reusable styles for hand switch or foot switch activated instruments.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: Valleylab™ monopolar and bipolar accessory cords are available in single-use or reusable styles for hand switch or foot switch activated instruments.

title: ForceTriad™ bipolar resection cord
shortdesc: The ForceTriad™ reusable bipolar resection cord is compatible with the ForceTriad™ energy platform.
description: The ForceTriad™ reusable bipolar resection cord is compatible with the ForceTriad™ energy platform.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The ForceTriad™ reusable bipolar resection cord is compatible with the ForceTriad™ energy platform.

title: ForceTriad™ bipolar adapter
shortdesc: The ForceTriad™ bipolar adapter allows connection of bipolar accessory cords with standard dual-pin connector to our energy platform.
description: The ForceTriad™ bipolar adapter allows connection of bipolar accessory cords with standard dual-pin connector to our energy platform.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The ForceTriad™ bipolar adapter allows connection of bipolar accessory cords with standard dual-pin connector to our energy platform.

title: Endo Mini-Shears™ instrument
shortdesc: The Endo Mini-Shears™ instrument is intended for use in a variety of endoscopic, gynecologic, and general laparoscopic procedures.
description: The Endo Mini-Shears™ with monopolar cautery are designed for introduction and use through all appropriately sized Medtronic™ trocar sleeves or larger sized trocar sleeves with the use of a converter.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Endo Mini-Shears™ with monopolar cautery are designed for introduction and use through all appropriately sized Medtronic™ trocar sleeves or larger sized trocar sleeves with the use of a converter.

title: Endo Sciz™ instrument
shortdesc: The Endo Sciz™ instrument is used in general, thoracic, gynecologic, urologic, and endoscopic procedures for mobilizing and transecting tissue.
description: The Endo Sciz™ instrument is used in general, thoracic, gynecologic, urologic, and endoscopic procedures for mobilizing and transecting tissue.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Endo Sciz™ instrument is used in general, thoracic, gynecologic, urologic, and endoscopic procedures for mobilizing and transecting tissue.

title: Endo Dissect™ instrument
shortdesc: The Endo Dissect™ instrument has application in a variety of endoscopic, gynecological, and laparoscopic procedures.
description: The Endo Dissect™ dissector with monopolar cautery is designed for introduction and use through all appropriately sized Medtronic™ trocar sleeves or larger sized trocar sleeves with the use of a converter.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Endo Dissect™ dissector with monopolar cautery is designed for introduction and use through all appropriately sized Medtronic™ trocar sleeves or larger sized trocar sleeves with the use of a converter.

title: Endo Shears™ instrument
shortdesc: The Endo Shears™ instrument is used in gynecologic, general, and endoscopic procedures for the mobilization and transection of tissue.
description: The Endo Shears™ instrument is used in gynecologic, general, and endoscopic procedures for the mobilization and transection of tissue.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Endo Shears™ instrument is used in gynecologic, general, and endoscopic procedures for the mobilization and transection of tissue.

title: Koning Vera Breast Cancer CT Scanner
shortdesc: For the First time in Breast Imaging History, KBCT has Introduced Co- Registration in Multiple Planes using TRUE 3D Volumetric Imaging
description: Current Mammogram Techniques are Falling Short of Expectations. With Documented Limitations, it is absurd that more Steps havent been taken to Mitigate these Issues. The benefits of Koning Breast CT are evident; KBCT rotates 360 around the Breast Acquiring a True Isotropic 3D dataset in 7 seconds.

ftr-1.name: Other Benefits Include:
ftrvals: Compelling Economics
Higher Throughput
High Quality, True Isotropic 3D imaging giving you Reliable Exam Results
Ability to Perform Biopsies without the need for Multiple Devices Capital Equipment Efficiency-Replaces
Small Footprint, Limited Facility Modification
Superior Detection Capabilities

ftr-2.name: Current Limitations of FFDM And DBT
ftrvals: Breast Compression (Inherently excludes chest wall)
Compression Artifacts
Ambiguity of Distribution
Measurement Inaccuracies
Difficulty in Defining Extent of Disease Poor Spatial Representation of ROI

Together, enhanced and standard ablation procedures create a comprehensive range of lesion shapes, sizes, and volumes — predictably and consistently. Extensively tested for lasting reliability, the Accurian™ ablation therapy platform is upgrade-ready for the future.

title: Valleylab™ smoke evacuation pencil
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ smoke evacuation pencils are available in multiple formats to fit your specific needs.
description: Smoke in the surgical field can obscure your vision, delay procedures, and pose risks to your team. Each Valleylab™ smoke evacuation pencil model offers the flexibility to facilitate access and visibility at the surgical site for your open procedures.

ftr-1.name: Valleylab™ smoke evacuation pencil
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ smoke evacuation pencil (button switch) with telescoping cannula provides visibility in the surgical site.

ftr-2.name: Valleylab™ smoke evacuation rocker switch pencil
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ smoke evacuation rocker switch pencil captures smoke with its narrow profile while provideing a balanced and secure grip.

ftr-3.name: Valleylab™ telescoping smoke evacuation rocker switch pencil
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ telescoping smoke evacuation pencil offers an independently telescoping smoke nozzle and electrode

title: RapidVac™ smoke evacuation system
shortdesc: The RapidVac™ smoke evacuation system captures and filters surgical smoke to remove odor, particulates, and other byproducts of electrosurgery procedures.
deschead: Easy, effective, economical, and quiet smoke evacuation
description: The RapidVac™ smoke evacuation system is designed to effectively capture and filter surgical smoke to remove odor, particulates, and other potentially hazardous byproducts of electrosurgery procedures. The system works with the Valleylab™ FT10 energy platform, Valleylab™ FX8 energy platform, and other Medtronic electrosurgical generators. Optional accessories are available to enable other electrosurgical generators to synchronize with the RapidVac™ system.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ smoke evacuation system consists of multiple components, all working together to capture and filter surgical smoke during procedures.

ftr-2.name: RapidVac™ smoke evacuator
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ smoke evacuator works with the Medtronic electrosurgical generator to evacuate electrosurgical smoke and laser plume.

ftr-3.name: RapidVac™ ULPA filter
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ ULPA filter is a four-stage smoke evacuation filter.

ftr-4.name: RapidVac™ interlink cable
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ interlink cable synchronizes the RapidVac™ system to the Medtronic generator.

ftr-5.name: RapidVac™ remote switch activator
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ remote switch activator synchronizes the RapidVac™ smoke evacuator system to a Medtronic generator by recognizing the cut and coag current that is being emitted.

ftr-6.name: RapidVac™ footswitch
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ smoke evacuator footswitch is used to activate the RapidVac™ smoke evacuator.

ftr-7.name: RapidVac™ smoke tubing
ftrvals: RapidVac™ smoke tubing enables controlled smoke evacuation when connected to the RapidVac™ ULPA filter.

ftr-8.name: RapidVac™ smoke wand
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ smoke wand is used in the evacuation of laser plume.

ftr-9.name: RapidVac™ fluid trap
ftrvals: The RapidVac™ fluid trap is designed to capture fluid that is inadvertently suctioned by the smoke capture device. This prevents fluid from reaching the filter. The RVFT10 connects to the 7/8 inch port on the RapidVac™ ULPA filter.

title: Valleylab™ SM smoke management pencil
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ SM smoke management pencil is a slim, integrated smoke pencil designed to remove surgical smoke plume during electrosurgery.
description: The Valleylab™ SM smoke management pencil provides smoke capture, in a lightweight ergonomic offering. This pencil allows surgeons to be confident they are effectively addressing surgical smoke at the source, protecting staff and patients alike.

ftr-1.name: Valleylab™ SM pencil
ftrvals: Striking the right balance between size, ergonomics, and smoke capture — the Valleylab™ SM pencil delivers superior air flow‡ and smoke removal§ in a compact, narrow design

ftr-2.name: Superior clinical performance
ftrvals: 30% higher air flow
More efficient smoke capture

ftr-3.name: Enhanced ergonomics
ftrvals: Supports natural hand and wrist movement
A lightweight and natural feel

ftr-4.name: Seamless integration
ftrvals: Easy set up
As natural to use as a standard electrosurgery pencil

ftr-5.name: 360 degrees of freedom
ftrvals: A 360-degree swivel supports natural hand and wrist movement.

ftr-6.name: Get a grip
ftrvals: Nonslip buttons are easy to use when you're wearing gloves.

ftr-7.name: A clear vision
ftrvals: A transparent tip for good visibility at the surgical site

ftr-8.name: Access granted
ftrvals: Optimal access to the surgical site

ftr-9.name: Keep a low profile
ftrvals: A compact, low-profile design means the Valleylab™ SM pencil fits into your OR environment.

ftr-10.name: Wired for efficiency
ftrvals: An integrated ESU wire simplifies cord management during your procedures.

title: Valleylab™ laparoscopic smoke evacuation system
shortdesc: The Valleylab™ laparoscopic smoke evacuation system connects to a standard luer-lock trocar and a suction or vacuum unit.
description: The Valleylab™ laparoscopic smoke evacuation system connects to a standard luer-lock trocar and a suction or vacuum unit.

ftr-1.name: Main Features
ftrvals: The Valleylab™ laparoscopic smoke evacuation system connects to a standard luer-lock trocar and a suction or vacuum unit.

title: ClosureFast RFA ablation system
shortdesc: The ClosureFast™ procedure uses radiofrequency energy to treat patients with superficial vein disease.
deschead: Deliver lasting results with gap-free thermal ablation
description: The ClosureFast™ procedure features a patented overlap of 0.5 cm at each thermal treatment segment, eliminating gaps between segments ― for lasting vein closure.

ftr-1.name: ClosureFast™ radiofrequency ablation catheter
ftrvals: The ClosureFast™ radiofrequency ablation catheter precisely heats an 8 cm vein segment (or 3 cm for shorter, refluxing vein lengths) in one 20-second interval.
The heat provided by the catheter shrinks and collapses the target vein, creating a fibrotic seal and occluding the vessel.

ftr-2.name: ClosureFast™ radiofrequency stylet
ftrvals: The ClosureRFS™ radiofrequency stylet is an intravascular ablation device specifically intended for the treatment of incompetent perforator and tributary veins.

This minimally invasive outpatient procedure leaves minimal scarring at the puncture site and can be either the primary treatment or an adjunct treatment using the ClosureFast™ radiofrequency ablation catheter.

ftr-3.name: ClosureFast™ radiofrequency generator
ftrvals: The ClosureRFG™ generator delivers radiofrequency energy to the ClosureFast™ radiofrequency ablation catheter and the ClosureRFS™ radiofrequency stylet for the effective treatment of CVI.
The controlled feedback mechanism monitors intravascular heat parameters in real time to automatically regulate therapeutic power.

title: Affera™ mapping system
shortdesc: The Affera™ mapping system with Prism-1 software is designed to automate, inform, and optimize the ablation procedure using innovative clinical tools.
description: Built with user experience in mind, the Affera™ mapping system addresses the most common needs of today's electrophysiologists with elegant features and an innovative suite of software functionalities to enhance clinical workflows.

ftr-1.name: Automatic and continuous collection
ftrvals: Collect everything; display the rhythm you want to see.

ftr-2.name: Fast remap and cloning
ftrvals: Start a new map quickly and efficiently while maintaining the active map's geometry, chamber, rhythm, window of interest, or even EGM data.

title: Situate™ detection system X
shortdesc: The Situate™ detection system X is designed to be used as an adjunct technology to manually counting surgical sponges.
description: The Situate™ detection system X uses a low-energy radiofrequency (RF) signal to detect surgical premium cotton (gauze, sponges, and towels) left in or around the patient within the surgical field.

ftr-1.name: Situate™ detection console
ftrvals: The console and user interface provide on-screen prompts that guide workflow and generate unique confirmation codes of each scan for convenient EMR entry — during the procedure. This allows OR staff to reconcile any inaccuracies before the case is closed.

ftr-2.name: Situate™ body scanner lite
ftrvals: The Situate™ body scanner pad, containing six evenly distributed radiolucent antennae, is placed under the patient. It identifies Situate™ detection system tagged sponges.

ftr-3.name: Situate™ room scanner
ftrvals: Situate™ room scanner is a handheld, motion-based device that locates missing sponges beyond the sterile field3 — in linens, trash, and anywhere else they may end up. The wand functions as both an antenna and receiver to look for and detect Situate™ premium cotton.

ftr-4.name: Situate™ premium cotton
ftrvals: Situate™ premium tagged cotton are single-use cotton disposables with an attached RF tag that must be used with the Situate™ detection system X. When activated by magnetic impulses from the scanning devices, the tag resonates a signal that allows for the detection of these cotton disposables.

title: Situate™ delivery system
shortdesc: The Situate™ delivery system is a delivery room safety tool designed to detect missing tagged sponges.
deschead: Protection against retained sponges for new mothers. Peace of mind for you.
description: The Situate™ delivery system is an adjunct technology to manual counting. It addresses retained sponge prevention in one of the most vital arenas in modern medicine, detecting missing tagged sponges in patients and the delivery room.

ftr-1.name: Situate™ delivery console
ftrvals: The user-friendly interface of the Situate™ delivery console offers on-screen prompts to ensure compliance and clearly indicates the presence or absence of remaining sponges.

ftr-2.name: Situate™ delivery scanner
ftrvals: The nonintrusive, handheld Situate™ delivery scanner is designed to enable post-delivery vaginal scanning optimized for angle and depth of the birthing canal. The scanner is an adjunct technology to manual counting.

ftr-3.name: Situate™ premium tagged cotton
ftrvals: The Situate™ system uses sensors to transmit nonionizing, low frequency radio waves to detect tagged cotton. When the tagged cotton is stimulated by the scanner's signal, it transmits its own signal back to the console, instantly identifying its presence.

title: Sonicision™ ultrasonic dissection device
shortdesc: The Sonicision™ 7 curved jaw ultrasonic dissector is a cordless device capable of coagulating and dissecting vessels.
deschead: Experience cordless freedom with the Sonicision™ 7 curved jaw ultrasonic device
description: The tapered jaw design of the Sonicision™ 7 curved jaw device provides the access and visibility you need to advance care. Get precise access to tissue planes† and access in tight spaces. Visualize target structures‡ and the tips of the device throughout your procedures. Discover its ability to follow curved anatomical structures.

ftr-1.name: Effortless efficiency
ftrvals: Dual-mode energy activation button provides more efficiency in surgical procedures than multi-button activation
7 mm vessel coagulation capability improves surgical efficiency over devices that coagulate vessels up to 5 mm
Easy assembly enables procedural efficiency, allowing nurses to have the device ready before the surgeon and patient are in the operating room

ftr-2.name: The essence of ease
ftrvals: Dual-mode energy control in one button improves procedural focus
Design facilitates comfortable use throughout a variety of procedures
Integrated torque wrench simplifies setup

ftr-3.name: The power of portability
ftrvals: Enables more natural movement
Makes instrument exchanges easier
Saves space in the OR with a smaller footprint

title: LigaSure™ XP Maryland jaw sealer-divider
shortdesc: The LigaSure™ XP Maryland jaw device offers next-level vessel sealing technology - including latching handles and one-step sealing.
deschead: Performance advantages that give you the edge
description: The LigaSure™ XP Maryland jaw sealer-divider is advancing surgical energy to meet the evolving needs of surgeons and their patients. With the LigaSure™ XP Maryland jaw device, you get all the advantages of the LigaSure™ technology you've come to love, plus additional next-level benefits.

ftr-1.name: Take vessel sealing to the next level
ftrvals: Offering one-step or latching handle designs, LigaSure™ XP Maryland jaw devices provide surgeons new levels of performance precision and procedural efficiency in vessel sealing.

ftr-2.name: Increased jaw length and optimal force to manage thick tissue
ftrvals: Longer seal plate with increased cut length
Larger jaw opening (aperture)
Higher jaw force for increased tissue compression when sealing and manipulating tissue
Nano-coated jaws reduce tissue sticking

ftr-3.name: Designed for more precise dissection
ftrvals: 360° continuous jaw rotation
Energized tissue dissection to tip of device
Blade travels close to device tip
Curved, tapered jaw profile for fine dissection
Jaw design makes it easier to access tissue planes

title: LigaSure™ exact dissector
shortdesc: The LigaSure™ exact dissector is a surgical dissection device with nonstick nano-coated jaws.
description: The LigaSure™ exact dissector offers precision and efficiency for better dissection† — with a cool jaw profile1 and enhanced ability to work in tight spaces. Built on reliable LigaSure™ technology, our newest surgical advancement offers faster cooling times1 with superior access and more precise dissection.

ftr-1.name: Fine dissection. Balanced handling
ftrvals: Balanced design that supports activations with either hand
Full soft-touch rings
Cutting trigger that's aligned with the handle to eliminate interference with wound edge
Curved jaw to maximize sight line
Slim nonstick nano-coated jaw for precise blunt dissection
Optimized length to provide precise control
Activation button

ftr-2.name: Low temperature profile
ftrvals: Cool down fast for secure and atraumatic tissue grasping
Stay cool over multiple activations
Higher jaw force for increased tissue compression when sealing and manipulating tissue
Nano-coated jaws reduce tissue sticking

ftr-3.name: Precise performance
ftrvals: Allows for precision around critical structures
Enhances the ability to work in tight spaces
Maximizes the line of sight

title: LigaSure Atlas™ tissue fusion open instrument
shortdesc: The LigaSure Atlas™ tissue fusion open instrument is a blunt tip vessel sealer and divider, featuring a 20 cm shaft for use in open procedures.
deschead: LigaSure Atlas™ tissue fusion open instrument
description: The LigaSure Atlas™ tissue fusion open instrument is a blunt tip vessel sealer and divider, featuring a 20 cm shaft for use in open procedures.

ftr-1.name: The LigaSure Atlas™ tissue fusion open instrument has the following procedural applications
ftrvals: Adhesiolysis
Abdominal hysterectomy
Gastric bypass
Colon resection
Cystectomy
Radical prostatectomy
Gastrectomy
Splenectomy
Salpingo-oophorectomy
Nephrectomy

title: LigaSure™ Maryland jaw thoracic sealer-divider
shortdesc: The LigaSure™ Maryland jaw thoracic sealer-divider is a multifunctional nano-coated instrument designed for sealing pulmonary veins and arteries.
deschead: Reliable vessel-sealing technology — tailored for thoracic surgery
description: The LigaSure™ Maryland jaw thoracic sealer/divider is part of our commitment to transforming lung care. It's the first — and only — minimally invasive LigaSure™ device designed for VATS procedures and indicated for sealing pulmonary veins and arteries up to and including 7 mm.

ftr-1.name: The multifunctional LigaSure™ Maryland jaw thoracic device complements thoracic procedures by providing
ftrvals: One-step vessel sealing
Enhanced blunt dissection
Secure, atraumatic grasping
Cold cutting independent of sealing

ftr-2.name: The LigaSure™ technology difference
ftrvals: Reliable LigaSure™ vessel-sealing technology drives the LigaSure™ thoracic device. It works by using the body's own collagen and elastin to create a permanent seal that is designed to withstand three times normal pulmonary systolic blood pressure.
Plus, LigaSure™ technology eliminates the guesswork — and minimizes thermal spread — by automatically discontinuing energy delivery when the seal cycle is complete.
